symptoms.name: Lesion appearance
symptoms.pattern: Small, grainy bumps; flesh-colored, white, pink, or tan

symptoms.name: Location of growths
symptoms.pattern: Hands, fingers, feet, or other areas

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May cause discomfort or irritation depending on location

physical_findings: Rough to the touch skin growths
Lesions consistent with viral warts (unspecified type)
risk_factors: Exposure to environments where viral warts are commonly contracted (e.g., communal showers, swimming pools)

required: Presence of skin growths consistent with viral warts
Clinical examination confirming viral warts without specifying a particular type
supportive: Patient history of similar growths or exposure to high-risk environments
